message: Let's split it 50/50 to get this over with!
I'll take 60, you can have 40. Let's move on.
Not bad, but I was thinking more like 45 for me. Your turn!
Still a fair split, but I think I deserve a bit more after rejecting your last offer.
You rejected my last offer, now it's my turn to take more. I'll give you a small consolation prize.
You're really pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not giving up yet. I'll make a counteroffer.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'm not going to compromise further. Take what you can get.
You're being unreasonable, Bob. I'm not going to settle for such a small share. I'll make one last offer.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Fine, have it your way. You'll regret this.
No way, Bob. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept this insult.
I'm done. You win, Bob. Take the whole thing. I'm out.
